app_detail:
My Sizes is an essential and well-thought-out application that specializes in storing and converting clothingğŸ‘— and shoeğŸ‘¡ sizes. With one touch you can convert all your stored clothing sizes into other international standards! Whether you are shopping in the United StatesğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸, EuropeğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º, Great BritainğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§, or RussiağŸ‡·ğŸ‡º, this app will demystify international size conventions! 

While thatâ€™s very convenient, WHAT MAKES THIS APP DIFFERENT FROM THE REST is that it can DETERMINE YOUR SIZES (or anyone elseâ€™s). Using a measurement that you obtain from the clear visual instructions, this app will generate either your shoe size, or a size for whatever clothing type you had in mind.

WHATâ€™S MORE is that with our extended version you can store clothing and shoe sizes for all your family and friends! You will be able to make pleasant surprises, as all of their sizes will be at hand all the time! 

While no app can guarantee a perfect fit without a try-on, My Sizes will be your best utility in the process leading up to the fitting room! We also know that different manufacturers have different approaches to sizes, even within a single size standard. Thatâ€™s why every size can be accompanied by your notes regarding fitting specifics. Everything is designed to make your clothing profile as personalized as possible. 


----------
The following clothing sizes are available for menğŸ¤µ: hats, shirts, suits, overcoats, jackets, sweaters, t-shirts, underwear, pants, jeans, socks, shoes;

The following clothing sizes are available for womenğŸ‘¸: hats, jackets, sweaters, dresses, suits, overcoats, t-shirts, bras, underwear, pants, socks, shoes;

The following clothing sizes are available for childrenğŸ‘¶: hats, jackets, sweaters, t-shirts, underwear, pants, socks, shoes.
